title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Great Barrier Island
description:
A new version of the Great Barrier Island - overhaul airport and scenery pack has been released a few days ago. In this video we will look at the 3 airports being updated using the mod:

- Great Barrier Aerodome (NZGB)
- Okiwi Station Airfield (NZOX)
- Motu Kaikoura Airstrip (NZKD) 

Besides this we will use the drone view to look in the surroundings from all 3 airports.

This addon can be downloaded from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/19523/nzgb-nzkd-nzox-great-barrier-island-overhaul-airport-scenery-pack
